resources.string: FastLyrics needs access to your device\'s notifications in order to find out what song is currently playing. You can allow this in the settings by clicking the button below
Tip: In newer versions of Android you can individually select what FastLyrics has access to. You can deselect everything because FastLyrics doesn\'t actually access any notifications
You can always come back here and enable/disable notification access if you can\'t find the right place in your system settings
